bioPage.title: Joshua Sohn
bioPage.subtitle: Film Composer / Songwriter
bio: Hi! I team up with great artists, film makers, game developers and businesses to write music that help elevate, engage, and inspire their message.

My name is Joshua Sohn. Much of my childhood was surrounded by the tune of church hymns, classical symphonies and rock music.  The turning point of my musical journey came when my mother passed away at age 14. While coping her loss, I used music to help express what I was feeling. The power of music became a source of healing and now would like to pass that on to others with my own writing.

Now almost 20 years later, I've developed a career in music, working with TV (Air Force Reserve, Dwight in Shining armor), feature films (Resilience and the Lost Gems, The Adventure of A.R.I.: My Robot Friend) and various production music companies including Velvet Green Music, AMADEA, and Gothic Storm.

referrals.name: Michael Lee
referrals.quote: I hired Josh to create original music for a 60 & 30 second broadcast regional spot for the Air Force Reserve. Josh was fast, attentive and made me look quite good.

referrals.name: Moises Lemus
referrals.quote: Josh is incredibly easy to work with and really brought out the emotion of my documentary with his music. He is professional and willing to go the extra mile.

referrals.name: Blake Tholen Clark
referrals.quote: Iâ€™ve worked for companies like American Idol, PBS, Comcast, Kroger, Vail Resorts and Utah State Government. Josh does good work and I recommend him.
